channel.title: Projects on Abdullah Azhar
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Abdullah Azhar

item.title: Fine Tuning OCR Free Document Understanding Transformer for Image-to-Text Captioning
item.description: Keywords - Deep Learning, Multi-Modal, Image-to-Text, Multiheaded Attention, Encoder-Decoder, PyTorch, Hugging Face, GPU, SGD, AdamW, Levenshtein Distance, Cross Entropy Loss, Attention Mask

item.title: Adapting to Context: A Case Study on In-Context Learning of Decision Tree Algorithms by Large Language Models
item.description: Keywords - Deep Learning, LLMs, GPT2, In-Context-Learning, Pre-Training, PyTorch, Decision Trees, Gaussian Distribution, Noisy Training, Out-of-Distribution, Prompting, Root-Mean-Squared-Error

item.title: Fine-tuning Vision Transformer-Based Model for Pose-Estimation
item.description: Keywords - Deep Learning, BLIP, Vision Transformer (ViT), Fine-Tuning, Vision-Language Pretraining (VLP), PyTorch, Mean Absolute Error (MAE), Causal Language Modelling, Self-Attention

item.title: Facial Recognition using eigenfaces/fisherfaces using an SVM Classifier
item.description: Keywords - Support Vector Machines, Principal Component Analysis, Eigen Faces, Fisher Faces, Linear Discriminant Analysis

item.title: Analyzing Spatio-Temporal Travel Times using Crowd-sourced Data
item.description: Exploring the bittersweet relationship of schools’ closure and smog – an effective step in alleviating traffic congestions?
